Text:
an amazing release....

Made a 320 CBR MP3 Torrent From this

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5196195/Explosions_in_The_Sky_Discography_(320CBR)

thanks for uploading this in flac. i dont want to sound like those people who complain on torrents but the log file from these albums show that the selected output for the flac files is  128 kBit/s. these flac versions of the explosions in the sky albums are available to download at other places too. can someone please upload their discography in actual lossless format. i registered to this site specifically to make this comment. thanks

thanks, thanks, thanks for this FLAC! 

BTW cdbox1234 mentions the log files show this is really 128 kBits/sec. It's true the log files claim 128kbps through 320kbps. So I ran all the FLAC files through Audiochecker 2.0 to verify.

It reports every track except one, is CDDA. Track 6 on the bonus disc is MP3.

Download with confidence!
